title: Be Thou My Vision

lines.raw: [A]Naught be all [D]else to me, [G]save that Thou [A]art--

tokens.lyric: Be Thou my wisdom and Thou my true word,

lines.raw: [A]Be Thou my wisdom and Thou my true word,

tokens.lyric: I ever with Thee and Thou with me, Lord;

lines.raw: [D]I ever with Thee and Thou with me, Lord;

tokens.lyric: Thou my great Father, and I Thy true son;

lines.raw: [G]Thou my great Father, and I Thy true son;

tokens.lyric: Thou in me dwelling, and I with Thee one.

lines.raw: [A]Thou in me dwelling, and I with Thee one.

tokens.lyric: Riches I heed not, nor man's empty praise,

lines.raw: [D]Riches I heed not, nor man's empty praise,

tokens.lyric: Thou mine inheritance, now and always;
Thou and Thou only, first in my heart,

lines.raw: [G]Thou and Thou only, first in my heart,

tokens.lyric: High king of heaven, my treasure Thou art.

lines.raw: [A]High king of heaven, my treasure Thou art.

tokens.lyric: High king of heaven, my victory won,

lines.raw: [D]High king of heaven, my victory won,

tokens.lyric: May I reach heaven's joys, O bright heaven's son!

lines.raw: [Bm]May I reach heaven's joys, O bright heaven's son!

tokens.lyric: Heart of my own heart, whatever befall,

lines.raw: [G]Heart of my own heart, whatever befall,

tokens.lyric: Still be my vision, O ruler of all.

lines.raw: [A]Still be my vision, O ruler of all.
